data.description: A Module for the creation of Radial Charts
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The radial graph module falls into the group of modules that build
    charts and graphs using GD hence the GD::Graph::Radial namespace
    suggestion.

    The interface has where possible been kept as similar to GD::Graph
    where possible but because of the nature of radial charts and the
    implementation of the module there are some specific differences
    making it different to GD::Graph.
